title: The Rise of Zero-Day Vulnerabilities: Why Traditional Security Solutions Fall Short
description: In recent years, the number and sophistication of zero-day vulnerabilities have surged, posing a critical threat to organizations of all sizes. A zero-day vulnerability is a security flaw in software that is unknown to the vendor and remains unpatched at the time of discovery.
